overview: She watched him become a handsome young man and lately, her curiosity about what's growing between his lets has cominated her thoughts. She hugs him just a little too long, driving herself wild dreaming of him sliding in and out of her. So when the moment comes to get even closer, she knows she won't deny it!
tagline: Crawling into bed with stepmom is so comforting.
title: Mommy's Boy 3
